fundamentals.title: Fundamentals
fundamentals.intro: An introduction to how Mobify delivers Progressive Web Apps as native iOS and Android apps using the Astro framework.

native-app-patterns.title: Native app patterns
native-app-patterns.intro: Important tips for designers including how web views work alongside native views.

components.title: Components
components.intro: How to use the UI kit to understand which components are available with Astro to deliver native experiences.

layouts.title: Best practice layouts
layouts.intro: Examples of how native components should be used in place of PWA components to create shopping templates on native apps.
